description:
Welcome to NYC! My apartment is recently renovated situated on a charming tree lined street. Within a three block radius you'll be able to find stores, supermarkets, laundromat, restaurants and most importantly TRANSPORTATION!

I am a 5 minute walk to the 7 train & LIRR
Grand Central 15 minutes
Bryant Park 16 minutes
Times Square 17 minutes
Penn Station (Madison Square Garden) 10 minutes

Simple and clean 3 Bedroom Apartment exclusive for you! Beautiful throughout with new kitchen. Three bedrooms (4 Beds total + Additional Sofa bed). Each bedroom is equipped with air conditioning.

Guests have exclusive access to the entire apartment, which is located on the first floor of 3 story house. The house consists of 3 apartments. One on each floor.

I provide the guest with the following:
Fully Equipped Kitchen
Plates, Bowls, Cups, Utensils
Coffee Machine 
Water Kettle
Paper Towels, Toilet Papers, Facial Tissues
Bath Towels
Body Wash, Shampoo, Conditioner
Blow Dryer
Iron & Ironing Board

I am available anytime by email, text, or call to answer any questions or concerns guests may have about their stay. Since the guests have the entire apartment exclusively to themselves they can go in and out as they wish.

Transportation available:

7 Train which runs from Flushing, Queens to Times Square. 
- 15 minutes to Grand Central
- 16 minutes to Bryant Park
- 17 minutes to Times Square
- 17 minutes to CitiField (home to the NY Mets) and Billie Jean King National Tennis Center (home to the US Open tournament)
- 20 minutes Rockefeller Christimas Tree & Center

Long Island Rail Road train
- 10 minute to Penn Station & Madison Square Garden

Q70 Express bus to LGA Airport, 
Q32 bus to Jackson Heights and Manhattan
Q60 bus from Jamaica to Manhattan (*15 minutes to Queens Center Mall and Target)
Q53 bus to Rockaway Beach.

Driving or using Taxis *time is based on average traffic
25 Minutes to Midtown
15 Minutes to Flushing
20 Minutes to Lower East Side
25 Minutes to Upper East Side
name: Fantastic 3 BR, 17 mins to Times Square + More!
review: Great location, nice and close to the Subway. Rooms are a great size, they're even bigger than they look in the photos! Very cleans and well kept! Good shower! And easy communication with owner! Will definitely look to stay here again in the future!
